titles.title: A bill to amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to extend the availability of funds to carry out the fruit and vegetable pilot program.
A bill to amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to extend the availability of funds to carry out the fruit and vegetable pilot program.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 870.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
Mr. Boehner moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on April 10, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to extend the availability of funds to carry out the fruit and vegetable pilot program.
